title: Toy Towners
description: John Reginald, an aspiring young writer, gets an alarming phone call in the middle of the night from an old friend, Jacob Fry, who's in distress.Jacob tells him a crazy story. The phone call has John venturing to the wilds of the Peak District, where his cranky friend now lives. With the help of a local girl, the two embark on a boozy wild goose chase, as they look for a dangerous stranger they know only as "Ern‚Äù. By turns gripping yet funny, romantic yet horrific, the story takes John along an unexpected pathway.
author: R.J. Towey
